subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
Food
lead_paragraph: Before the opening rounds of the 100- and 400-meter track and field races at the London Games, the world’s fastest men take stock of what they consume right before they race.
snippet: Before the opening rounds of the 100- and 400-meter track and field races at the London Games, the world’s fastest men take stock of what they consume right before they race.
